sentence.Network_en: Regrettably we have to house families in these inadequate flats.
sentence.Network_cn: 很遗憾，我们不得不让住户挤在这些狭小的公寓里。

sentence.Network_en: Government initiatives to help young people have been inadequate.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府在积极帮助年轻人方面做得还不够。

sentence.Network_en: The crash was a direct result of inadequate navigational aids.
sentence.Network_cn: 坠机是导航不力的直接后果。

entry.tran: 不充分的;不足的;不够好的
entry.def: If something is inadequate, there is not enough of it or it is not good enough.

example.ex: Supplies of food and medicines are inadequate...
The problem goes far beyond inadequate staffing.
example.tran: 问题远非人手不足那么简单。

entry.tran: 不够格的;不能胜任的;不适合的
entry.def: If someone feels inadequate, they feel that they do not have the qualities and abilities necessary to do something or to cope with life in general.

example.ex: I still feel inadequate, useless and mixed up...
example.tran: 我仍然感到自己能力不够,毫无用处,整个儿一团糟。

example.ex: Mary Ann felt painfully inadequate in the crisis.
example.tran: 意识到自己在这场危机中无能为力，玛丽·安感到很痛苦。

means.word_mean: 1. (sometimes followed by `to') not meeting the requirements especially of a task;
2. not sufficient to meet a need;

auth_sentence.content: Inadequate consideration is being given to the environmental effects.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inadequate consideration is being given to the environmental effects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inadequate consideration is being given to the environmental effects.

auth_sentence.content: Health, education and infrastructure are all seriously inadequate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Health, education and infrastructure are all seriously inadequate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Health, education and infrastructure are all seriously inadequate.

auth_sentence.content: Trying to blow the fire out would be inadequate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Trying to blow the fire out would be inadequate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Trying to blow the fire out would be inadequate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+significant有意义的→adj.无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒
in向内,成为,进入,使……+hale气→进气,吸气
in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

Sentence.sentence: The Second World War led to an inadequate supply of food  in Britain.
They show inadequate respect for evidence-based inquiry
Inefficient harvesting, inadequate local transportation and poor infrastructure (基础设施)mean that produce is frequently handled inappropriately and stored under unsuitable farm site conditions.

Some parents who withdraw their children from the schools in favor of home schooling have an inadequate educational background and insufficient formal training to provide a satisfactory education for their children.

sentences.en: The causes of social distress include inadequate housing.
sentences.cn: 造成社会困境的原因包括住房不足。

means.word_mean: 不足胜任的,信心不足的

sentences.en: She was inadequate to the demands that were made on her.
sentences.cn: 她还无力满足对她提出的各项要求。
